version_description:
This update improves stability and performance issues including:

• Provides more reliable connectivity and performance on busy Wi-Fi networks
• Improves velocity sensitivity and dynamic range for Touch Instruments
• Pressing the home button now prevents hung notes from continuing to play

This release is recommended for all Logic Remote customers.

This update improves stability and performance issues including:

• Provides more reliable connectivity and performance on busy Wi-Fi networks
• Improves velocity sensitivity and dynamic range for Touch Instruments
• Pressing the home button now prevents hung notes from continuing to play

This release is recommended for all Logic Remote customers.

This update improves stability and performance issues including:

• Compatible with GarageBand for Mac v10.0
• Velocity range is adjustable for Touch Instruments
• Library Browser and Smart Controls can now appear on screen together

This release is recommended for all Logic Remote customers.

This update improves stability and performance issues including:

• Compatible with GarageBand for Mac v10.0
• Velocity range is adjustable for Touch Instruments
• Library Browser and Smart Controls can now appear on screen together

This release is recommended for all Logic Remote customers.
• Fixes an issue that prevented Scale Modes and Chord Strips from updating to the current project key.
• Fixes an issue that prevented Scale Modes and Chord Strips from updating to the current project key.

• New streamlined design 
• Adds more scale choices for Touch Instruments

• New streamlined design 
• Adds more scale choices for Touch Instruments
• Support for iOS 8
• Support for iOS 8

• New plug-in view provides access to Logic or Audio Unit plug-in parameters
• Use Multi-Touch gestures to shape the tone of your tracks with Visual EQ
• Remotely add or re-order plug-ins 
• Control the microphone and other input settings for compatible audio interfaces

• New plug-in view provides access to Logic or Audio Unit plug-in parameters
• Use Multi-Touch gestures to shape the tone of your tracks with Visual EQ
• Remotely add or re-order plug-ins 
• Control the microphone and other input settings for compatible audio interfaces
• Stability improvements and bug fixes
• Stability improvements and bug fixes

• New tabbed Transform Pad and X/Y Pad Smart Controls for Alchemy instruments
• Multiple stability and connectivity improvements

• New tabbed Transform Pad and X/Y Pad Smart Controls for Alchemy instruments
• Multiple stability and connectivity improvements
• Fixes a bug that caused display issues with the Visual EQ
• Fixes a bug that caused display issues with the Visual EQ

This update contains numerous fixes and enhancements including:

• Adds support for iPad Pro and iPhone*
• Multiple iOS devices can now be used simultaneously
• iPad Pro extends the usable range of mixer faders, the keyboard and other Touch Instruments
• iPad Pro allows you to access key commands alongside Smart Controls and Touch Instruments
• Fixes and enhancements to improve connectivity

* iPhone version is compatible with Logic Pro X or GarageBand only and limited to transport control, dual channel strip faders, automation recording, and access to key commands

This update contains numerous fixes and enhancements including:

• Adds support for iPad Pro and iPhone*
• Multiple iOS devices can now be used simultaneously
• iPad Pro extends the usable range of mixer faders, the keyboard and other Touch Instruments
• iPad Pro allows you to access key commands alongside Smart Controls and Touch Instruments
• Fixes and enhancements to improve connectivity

* iPhone version is compatible with Logic Pro X or GarageBand only and limited to transport control, dual channel strip faders, automation recording, and access to key commands

• Improves reliability of WiFi connection to the Mac
• Keyboard with optional scale modes is now available on iPhone

• Improves reliability of WiFi connection to the Mac
• Keyboard with optional scale modes is now available on iPhone

• Restores the option to connect your iOS device using a computer-to-computer Wi-Fi network created on your Mac*
• Adds the ability to use a Lightning to USB Cable for wired connection to your Mac**
• Numerous additional stability improvements and bug fixes

*Requires macOS 10.12.4 and iOS 10.3 or later
**Requires macOS 10.12.4, iTunes 12.6, and iOS 10.3 or later

• Restores the option to connect your iOS device using a computer-to-computer Wi-Fi network created on your Mac*
• Adds the ability to use a Lightning to USB Cable for wired connection to your Mac**
• Numerous additional stability improvements and bug fixes

*Requires macOS 10.12.4 and iOS 10.3 or later
**Requires macOS 10.12.4, iTunes 12.6, and iOS 10.3 or later

• Updated for Super Retina display on iPhone X
• Touch Instrument controls now available on iPhone, including guitar, bass, drums, and chord strips
• Provides stability improvements and bug fixes

• Updated for Super Retina display on iPhone X
• Touch Instrument controls now available on iPhone, including guitar, bass, drums, and chord strips
• Provides stability improvements and bug fixes

• Control Live Loops from your iPad or iPhone by triggering cells or switching between scenes
• Use Multi-Touch to perform Remix FX on individual tracks or the entire song mix
• Browse and add Apple Loops to your Live Loops projects from your iPad

• Supports keyboard commands when using a Smart Keyboard or Bluetooth keyboard
